name: git-flashback
description: Explore Git File History Like a Time Machine

git-flashback.useCustomFormat.description: Use custom format string instead of individual display options

git-flashback.commitFormat.description: Git log format for commit display. See git log --pretty=format documentation for available placeholders.

git-flashback.showSubject.description: Show commit subject in the list

git-flashback.showHash.description: Show commit hash in the list

git-flashback.showAuthor.description: Show commit author in the list

git-flashback.showEmail.description: Show author email in the list

git-flashback.showDate.description: Show commit date in the list

git-flashback.showRelativeDate.description: Show relative date (e.g., 2 days ago) in the list

git-flashback.useExtendedDiff.description: Show diff between commits instead of file content when navigating

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
